message.entry: Connect to and control Arduino® and ESP32 inputs and outputs from MATLAB and Simulink.
Use MATLAB and Simulink to interactively communicate with Arduino and ESP32 hardware.
Use the Arduino Explorer to interactively set up an Arduino and ESP32 hardware, read, write, and analyze data from the hardware, and generate code.
MATLAB Support Package for Arduino Hardware
Set up and configure Arduino and ESP32 hardware to communicate with MATLAB on your host computer.
Troubleshooting in MATLAB Support Package for Arduino Hardware.
Simulink Support Package for Arduino Hardware
Set up and configure Arduino and ESP32 hardware to communicate with Simulink on your host computer.
This example shows how to use Simulink® Support Package for Arduino® Hardware to run a Simulink model on Arduino board.
